# Interlude I: The Silence of the Foundation {.unnumbered}


> "Before you can build a prison, you must understand the soil. A man who sleeps well is a man who dreams of escape. A man who iterates through the night is a man who has already been caught."
> 
> — *The Reverse Maven*

In the chapters that follow, we move from the vessel to the cargo. Having dismantled the body’s natural rhythms, we now begin to curate the thoughts that will fill the resulting void. Remember: a tired body is the best audience for a fragile mind.
